sections.body: This powerful spell combines all of the planar ally/planar binding effects and can be used to transport many creatures between planes.
sections.name: Gate

sections.body: The pinnacle of spellcasting, these spells can duplicate almost any weaker spell, obliterate most harmful effects, revive the dead, or even turn back time. If your spell is better than wish, you're trying to play god.
sections.name: Miracle/Wish

sections.body: This is the only spell in the game that lets the caster take multiple rounds' worth of actions and simultaneously prevents anyone else from doing anything about it.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Designing Spells/Benchmarks/9th Level/Time Stop
sections.name: Time Stop
